atypicalToolName.title: Atypical tool name
atypicalToolName.description: Electronic communication with the procuring entity requires the use of a tool or device that is not generally available. This is the name of this tool or device.

atypicalToolUrl.title: Atypical tool URL
atypicalToolUrl.description: Electronic communication with the procuring entity requires the use of tools and devices that are not generally available. These tools are accessible via this URL.

noticeRequestedPublicationDate.title: Notice preferred publication date
noticeRequestedPublicationDate.description: The preferred date of publication of the notice (e.g. to avoid publication during a national holiday)

futureNoticeDate.title: Future notice date
futureNoticeDate.description: The estimated date of publication of the next sequential notice. For a planning notice this will be the competition notice.

invitationToConfirmInterest.title: Invitation to confirm interest
invitationToConfirmInterest.description: The estimated period of dispatch of the invitations to confirm interest in participation. This field is applicable only when the release is a planning call for competition notice.

documentAvailabilityPeriod.title: Document availability period
documentAvailabilityPeriod.description: The period during which documents can be accessed, or during which requests for access to documents can be submitted.
